Mass. officials wary of NRA proposal to arm schools

Price disparities widening at gas pumps

While there is normally a gap between high and low gas prices, the spread right now is unusually wide, caused in part by how fast prices in the overall market fall. (Globe)

Over a century of letters to Santa Claus

The US Postal Service's Letters to Santa program, in its 100th year, lets postal workers read the pleas and refer needy families to people who wish to help. (Boston Globe)
